paperback-writer.output.types.dsc: Output formats: PDF, HTML, PNG, JPEG. Multiple output formats are supported.
paperback-writer.output.auto.dsc: Enable Auto export on save. To apply the settings, you need to restart Visual Studio Code
paperback-writer.output.listOfFileNamesE: Excluded file name of exportOnSave option
paperback-writer.output.directory.dsc: Specify the directory to export to. If left empty, the file will be exported to the same location as the source file.
paperback-writer.output.directoryRelativ: If set, the relative path specified in the export directory will be interpreted as relative to the location of that file.
paperback-writer.style.typography.h1Head: Automatically adjusts H1 to H6 font sizes based on a predefined jump ratio and the H1-body text size ratio.
paperback-writer.style.customCSS: List of paths for custom stylesheets (CSS) to be used.
paperback-writer.style.customCSSRelative: If set, incorporate the paths to the CSS files specified in custom styles as is (without converting to relative paths).
extension.paperback-writer.all: Output Markdown to HTML, PDF, PNG, JPEG
paperback-writer.PDF.headerHtmlElementTe: pdf only. HTML template for the print header.
paperback-writer.PDF.footerHtmlElementTe: pdf only. HTML template for the print footer.
paperback-writer.PDF.paperSizeFormat.dsc: Paper size (pdf only), invalid if paper 'Pdf Paper Width' or 'Pdf Paper Height' is set.
paperback-writer.PDF.paperWidth.dsc: Paper width (pdf only), mm, cm, in, px units are available. If set, `Pdf Paper Size Format` will be disabled.
paperback-writer.PDF.paperHeight.dsc: Paper height (pdf only), mm, cm, in, px units are available. If set, `Pdf Paper Size Format` will be disabled.
paperback-writer.PDF.margin.top.dsc: Page Option. Border Top. units: mm, cm, in, px
paperback-writer.PDF.margin.bottom.dsc: Page Option. Border Bottom. units: mm, cm, in, px
paperback-writer.PDF.margin.right.dsc: Page Option. Border Right. units: mm, cm, in, px
paperback-writer.PDF.margin.left.dsc: Page Option. Border Left. units: mm, cm, in, px
paperback-writer.image.clip.x.dsc: png and jpeg only. x-coordinate of top-left corner of clip area.
paperback-writer.image.clip.y.dsc: png and jpeg only. y-coordinate of top-left corner of clip area.
paperback-writer.image.clip.width.dsc: png and jpeg only. Width of clip area.
paperback-writer.image.clip.height.dsc: png and jpeg only. Height of clip area.
markdown-pdf.outputDirector.notExist: The output directory specified by the outputDirectory option does not exist.
paperback-writer.pathToAnExternalChromiu: Path to a Chromium or Chrome executable to run instead of the bundled Chromium.
